page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: a ploughman's lunch at whist drive. The entertainment is monthly. The members sometimes have a singer or somebody who plays music. This week the members were listening to records. I think the Good Companions is a very friendly idea because it gives elderly people a chance to meet each other. {Woking Park}.This is the only park in our area. It is quite a big park-43 acres. There is a lot to do like crazy golf, putting, cricket, bowling, tennis, and there is an outdoor swimming pool. The park is known for its trees and floral displays. It provides enjoyable walks. The park has a children's playground and a duck enclosure. Next to the park is the Leisure Centre.
